img_above_text:
![Wukong Turtle 12.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/c/cd/Wukong_Turtle_12.jpg)
Expect her to get more aggressive in this second half, expelling more lightning at the end of some of her close-combat attacks that require more dodging and less room for counters. You can still use Immobilize to keep her from floating away, however.
img_below_text:
Another move she can now perform in her enhanced state is to expel a bunch of those serpent-like electric projectiles straight up from her body, which will twist in the air before coming back down to track you, and will require you taking some evasive action.
![Wukong Turtle 14.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/d/da/Wukong_Turtle_14.jpg)

content.text:
You are given an image and related metadata and context.

            Image Position:
            - This is 12 from the file 'Kang-Jin_Star.md'.

            Context:
            - Preceding Text: "![Wukong Turtle 12.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/c/cd/Wukong_Turtle_12.jpg)
Expect her to get more aggressive in this second half, expelling more lightning at the end of some of her close-combat attacks that require more dodging and less room for counters. You can still use Immobilize to keep her from floating away, however."
            - Following Text: "Another move she can now perform in her enhanced state is to expel a bunch of those serpent-like electric projectiles straight up from her body, which will twist in the air before coming back down to track you, and will require you taking some evasive action.
![Wukong Turtle 14.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/d/da/Wukong_Turtle_14.jpg)"

            Your task:
            1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
            2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.

img_summary:
1. **Summary**:  
The image depicts a dramatic moment from *Black Myth: Wukong*, showcasing the "Kang-Jin Star" boss fight. The scene features a dark, stormy environment with lightning streaks emanating across the battlefield, emphasizing the boss's enhanced state and electric attacks. The player character is positioned near a rocky structure, preparing to evade or counter the incoming threats.

2. **Purpose/Narrative Role**:  
The image illustrates the escalating intensity of the boss battle, where the "Kang-Jin Star" employs more aggressive lightning-based attacks. It visually complements the preceding text about dodging close-combat attacks and the following text describing serpent-like electric projectiles, reinforcing the player's need for strategic evasion and adaptability.
